identity.description:
Search PubMed articles via keywords, PubTator IDs, or entity relation queries.

Find PubMed articles that match a keyword, a PubTator entity ID (e.g. "@GENE_BRAF"), or an entity-to-entity relation expression (e.g. "relations:treat|@CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin|@DISEASE_Neoplasms").
capabilities: Search PubMed articles using keywords, PubTator IDs, or relation queries
Support pagination with page and page_size parameters
Retrieve PMIDs matching the search criteria

query.description: What you want to search for. This can be plain keywords, a single PubTator ID, or the special relation syntax shown above.

page_size.description: How many PMIDs to return per page (optional; default = 20, maximum = 200).

purpose.model:
SentenceTransformer(
  (0): Transformer({'max_seq_length': 4096, 'do_lower_case': False, 'architecture': 'BertModel'})
  (1): Pooling({'word_embedding_dimension': 384, 'pooling_mode_cls_token': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_tokens': True, 'pooling_mode_max_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_sqrt_len_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_weightedmean_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_lasttoken': False, 'include_prompt': True})
  (2): Normalize()
)
